name: Dungeon Survival (itch) (GS_F)
description:
Contributed by Chris Xu, Rachel Tao and Songyang Guo

Survive 10 waves and the final boss to win. Enemies would become stronger and stronger in each wave, and elite enemies who shoot homing attack will start to spawn after wave 6. 

You gain exp and gold on enemy kills; you gain skill point and attribute points that you can distribute freely by using the GUI on level up. Explore this system on yourself!

You can also trade health with the Blood Priest for attribute points or mana with the Magic Professor for skill points. The Taco Cook sells tacos, which regenerates your health and mana. The dark believer would summon bosses, which would drop huge amount of gold and exp on death. 

Skill hot keys are displayed on the skill bar. Press Esc to pause the game. You can interact with the NPCs in the dungeon by clicking on them. WASD to move, right click to attack.
